info.title: Alchemy Private Transactions API JSON-RPC Specification
info.description: A specification of the standard JSON-RPC methods for Private Transactions API.

methods.name: eth_cancelPrivateTransaction
methods.summary: Request to cancel a private transaction that was sent via eth_sendPrivateTransaction.

params.name: txHash
params.description: Transaction hash for the private transaction to be cancelled.

result.name: Cancellation Status
result.description: Returns true if the transaction was successfully cancelled, false otherwise.

methods.name: eth_sendPrivateTransaction
methods.summary: Send a single private transaction through Flashbots. Private transactions are sent directly to validators and not included in the public mempool.

params.name: maxBlockNumber
params.description: Hex-encoded number for the highest block number in which the transaction should be included.

fast.description: Sends transaction with fast mode when true.

result.name: Transaction Hash
result.description: Returns the transaction hash (32-byte hex string).
